body: Artist.

title: hairpin
body:
A [[hair ornament]] used to hold hair in place. Unlike a [[hairclip]], a hairpin lacks a clasping mechanism and simply slides into the hair. It can take the shape of a 'U' or a [[hair stick|stick]] and may have decorative ornaments at one end. The simplest and the most common hairpin is a bobby pin, which is often drawn as a simple line on a lock of hair.

h4. See also

* [[hairclip]]
* [[hair stick]]
* [[chinese hairpin]]

title: hairclip
body:
A decorative clip or clasp generally used to hold hair in place or for fashion purposes. Also known as a barrette or a hair slide.

h4. See also

* [[hairpin]]
* [[hair bobbles]]
* [[claw hair clip]]

title: yuu_(twisted_wonderland)
body:
The player character of [i][[Twisted Wonderland]][/i]. Their gender is unrevealed and their name can be changed by the player.

Typically they're depicted as having brown hair and brown eyes, but it's honestly up to the artist to choose a design for them.

Also referred to as "the Prefect" in lieu of calling them "the Player."

h4. Notable incarnations
* Enma Yuuken - Male Yuu from the Heartslabyul manga spinoff
* Hirasaka Yuuka - Female [[reverse trap]] Yuu from the Savanaclaw manga spinoff
* Mito Yuuta - Male [[fat]] Yuu from the Octavinelle manga spinoff
* Kuroki Yuuya - Male Yuu from the novelization series

title: michelin_man
body:
The [[mascot]] of the [[Michelin]] tire company. A humanoid stack of white [[unused tire]]s.

In French, he is known as "Bibendum". His name comes from the Roman lyric poet Horace's Poem 37 [i]"Nunc est bibendum"[/i] ("Now is the time to drink").

title: nissan
body:
A major Japanese [[car|automobile]] company founded in 1933. Operated in export markets under the [[Datsun]] marque until 1984. In 1989 they opened [[Infiniti (company)|]] to sell their luxury vehicles in America under new branding.

Its flagship model is the [[Nissan GT-R]], the successor to the famed [[Nissan Skyline GT-R]] series.

Nissan's official motorsports branch and factory racing team is [[NISMO]].

title: republic_of_china_school_uniform
body:
The may fourth outfit, or Republic of China era [[school uniform]] consists of a black [[medium skirt]] and a [[blue shirt]] with a [[mandarin collar]]. It can be in other colors as well, but this is the most famous combination. 

In the painting "May Fourth Movement" by Liang Yulong (梁玉龙) a woman can be seen in the front lines of a parade wearing this outfit, which is likely the origin of this particular color combination being the most popular.

title: mint_(arknights)
body:
[i]Mint, the Victorian Caster, seeks recognition as a scholar far more than as a Caster.[/i]

A playable Caster Operator in [[Arknights]].

Real name: Eleanor.

h4. Profile
[expand]
[table]
[tbody]
      [tr][td]Place of Birth:[/td]
      [td]Victoria[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Birthday:[/td]
      [td]February 5[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Race:[/td]
      [td]Feline[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Height:[/td]
      [td]155 cm[/td][/tr]
      [tr][td]Combat Experience:[/td]
      [td]None[/td][/tr]
  [/tbody]
[/table]
[/expand]

Affiliated with the Victorian Institution for Higher Studies, specializing in geology, frequently participating in investigative field projects. She contracted Oripathy on an expedition and was referred by Operator [[Skyfire (Arknights)|]] to Rhodes Island for consultation and eventual treatment.

Has a serious sense of curiosity which has frequently put her in danger. Also in possession of a monster book and a staff, which she uses during combat.

Her motif is based on [[Siamese cat|Siamese cats]].

Her [[voice actor]] is [[Oowada Hitomi]].

h4. Skins

* [[Mint (Tsukiyoi) (arknights)|Tsukiyoi]]
* [[Mint (Private Study) (Arknights)|Private Study]]

title: sonic_heroes
body:
[b]Sonic Heroes[/b] (ソニック ヒーローズ [i]Sonikku Hīrōzu[/i]) is a [[2003]] 3D [[Sonic (series)|]] game published by [[Sega]] and developed by [[Sonic Team]]. The game released for the [[PlayStation 2]], [[GameCube|Nintendo GameCube]], [[Xbox (original)|]] and Windows PC, being the first to be released on a non-Sega home console. 

In this game, the player takes control of one of four teams, each with three characters who fall into one of three categories; [b]Speed[/b], [b]Fly[/b] and [b]Power[/b], each team has different stage formations, objectives and abilities as well. They need to work in teams to stop Dr. Eggman's new scheme, in a story meant to take place after the events of [[Sonic Adventure 2]]. 

h4. Characters
h5. [[Team Sonic (sonic)|]]
* [[Sonic the hedgehog|Sonic the Hedgehog]]
* [[Tails (Sonic)|Miles "Tails" Prower]]

* [[E-123 Omega]]

h5. [[Team Rose (sonic)|]]

h5. [[Team Chaotix (sonic)|]]

title: tantou
body:
A single or double-edged [[short sword]] or [[dagger]] carried by [[samurai]] in Japan or by noblewomen for self-defense. The sides of the blade are nearly flat.

Early tantous had no aesthetic quality and were pure weapons, but up until the 16th century, the tanto was preferred to the [[wakizashi]] for use in battle by samurai while a wakizashi was used for ceremonial occasions. After this period, they were used interchangeably. Can be used either for stabbing or slashing.

h4. See also

* [[List of weapons]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: Tantō":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Tantō

title: bakugan_gundalian_invaders
body:
The 3rd season of the [[Bakugan]] anime series, which centers around the war between the alien races known as Neathians and the Gundalians.

[[kuusou_danma|Kuso Dan]], [[Marukura Marucho]] and [[Kazami Shun]] return as the main 3 recurring brawlers, and are joined by [[Fabia Sheen]], [[Jake Vallory]] and [[Ren Krawler]].

The main Gundalian antagonists are the 12 Orders who are lead by Emperor Barodius. The initial antagonists are Gundalian agents sent to Earth, which are comprised of [[Bruce Brown]], [[Ethan Glenn]], [[Lena Isis]], [[Sid Arkail]] and [[Zenet Sirone]].
other_names: ガンダリアンインベーダーズ

title: bakugan_new_vestroia
body:

The 3 main returning characters are [[kuusou_danma|Kuso Dan]], [[Marukura Marucho]] and [[Kazami Shun]], they are joined by [[Mira Fermen]], [[Ace Grit]] and [[Baron Leltoy]], who all form the Bakugan Brawlers Resistance.

The main antagonists are the Vexos, comprised of [[Spectra Phantom]], [[Gus Grav]], [[hydron_(bakugan)|Prince_Hydron]], [[Lync Volan]], [[Mylene Furrow]], [[Shadow Prove]], [[Volt Luster]].

title: bakugan_battle_brawlers
body:
The first season of the [[Bakugan]] anime series, which details the first meeting between Vestroia and Earth and consequently humans meeting Bakugan. 

The main characters are: 

[[Kuusou Danma]], The leader of the Battle Brawlers and a Pyrus user whose main bakugan is [[Drago]]. 
[[Misaki Runo]], a tomboyish girl who is a Haos user and later Dan's girlfriend.
[[Marukura Marucho]], a young short but intellegent boy who is an Aquos user.
[[Alice Gehabich]], a kind, gentle girl from Russia who is a Darkus user. 
[[Julie Heyward]], a cheerful girl who is a Subterra user.
[[Kazami Shun]], a skilled ninja who is a Ventus user.

title: bakugan
body:
A toy and anime franchise launched in 2007 that centers around the eponymous creatures known as Bakugan. They take the shape of balls that transform into beasts when thrown into battle. The story generally revolves around the Bakugan home planet known as Vestroia coming into contact with Earth and humans meeting the Bakugan. 

The original Bakugan anime ran for 4 seasons:

[[Bakugan Battle Brawlers]] 
[[Bakugan New Vestroia]] 
[[Bakugan Gundalian Invaders]]
Bakugan Mechtanium Surge

The anime was rebooted in 2018 with the first season titled; 
[[Bakugan: Battle Planet]] 

And again in 2023, simply titled; "Bakugan".

title: greta_hofmann
body:
[b]Greta Hofmann[/b] is a non-playable character in [[Reverse:1999]], and also the sister of [[Enigma (Reverse:1999)|Enigma]]. She is an Experienced Field Investigator of The Foundation. In the story, she and [[Marcus (Reverse:1999)|Marcus]] are off to Vienna to find clues about Manus Vindictae's ritual that makes them immune to the Storm. Thanks to the joint effort of her, Marcus, and [[Kakania (Reverse:1999)|Kakania]], their mission is success [spoiler]making her sacrifice all worth it.[/spoiler]

Her family name, Hofmann, become the base name of the ritual core against the "Storm", [[Hofmann Knot]].

She is voiced by Marisa McIntyre in English and [[Taichi You]] in Japanese.

h4. Appearance
* !post #7259984

title: commander_cody
body: Character from [[Star Wars]], Cody, formerly designated CC-2224, was a male Clone Marshal Commander in the Grand Army of the Republic who commanded the 7th Sky Corps—including its renowned subunit the 212th Attack Battalion—during the Clone Wars. He served as the second-in-command of High [[Jedi]] General [[Obi-Wan Kenobi]] within the Third Systems Army and the 7th Sky Corps. General Kenobi found the commander to be reliable, trustworthy and loyal, with his abilities as a soldier and strategist earning Cody the respect of both his Jedi superiors and fellow clone troopers.

title: b'omarr_monk
body:
The B'omarr Order, which consisted of B'omarr monks, was a religious order that believed in isolating themselves from all physical sensation to enhance the power of their minds. To that aim, enlightened monks had their brains transplanted into nutrient-filled jars. Whenever they wanted to move, those bottled-brains used spider-like droid walkers. Older monks used four-legged walkers, but younger monks used a six-legged variant.

The order possessed multiple regeneration gems, which at the time of [[Jabba the Hutt]] were stored underground behind triple doors.

The B'omarr Order first appeared in the 1983 film [[star wars: return of the jedi|Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi]].

title: class_dd51
body:
The [[Class DD51]] (DD51形) is a B-2-B wheel arrangement [[Diesel locomotive|Diesel-hydraulic]] [[locomotive]] type operated in Japan since 1962. 649 [[Locomotive|locomotives]] were built between 1962 and 1978 by Kawasaki Sharyo, Hitachi, and Mitsubishi. The class was designed for mainline passenger and [[Freight train|freight]] use with more power than the [[Class_D51|D51]] and a higher maximum speed than the [[Class_C62|C62 steam locomotive]] classes.

title: airport_security
body:
A security process involving the thorough screening of individuals and their belongings for prohibited items or threats before boarding an airplane or exiting an airport terminal. Known for its stringent and time-consuming procedures, such as the use of metal detectors, X-ray machines, pat-downs, guard dogs, and other security measures.

h4. External links

"Wikipedia: Airport security":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Airport_security]

title: diesel_locomotive
body:
A [[diesel locomotive]] is a type of [[locomotive]] in which the power source is a diesel engine. Several types of diesel locomotives have been developed, differing mainly in the means by which mechanical power is conveyed to the driving wheels. The most common are diesel-electric locomotives and diesel-hydraulic.

title: train_station_platform_gate
body:
Also Known As Platform screen doors (PSDs), & Platform edge doors (PEDs), are used at some [[train station|train]], rapid transit and people mover stations to separate the platform from [[Railroad tracks|train tracks]], as well as on some [[bus]] rapid transit, [[streetcar|tram]] and light rail systems. Primarily used for passenger safety, they are a relatively new addition to many [[Subway|metro]] systems around the world, some having been retrofitted to established systems. They are widely used in newer Asian and European metro systems, and Latin American bus rapid transit systems.

title: orlik_armoured_train
body:
Orlik, Zaamurets, among other names, was an [[armored train|armoured]] [[train]] built by the Russian Empire in 1916. While originally made to fight in the First World War, it was extensively used in the Russian Civil War by Bolshevik forces and most notably the Czechoslovak Legion, before being used by the White Movement to serve Chinese warlords. During its service it was frequently renamed and nicknamed as it changed hands and traveled across Eurasia.

H4. Example
* !asset #23977227: [[Orlik Armoured Train]]

H4. See also
* [[Armored Train]]
* [[Train]]

H4. External links
* [Wikipedia page about the Orlik(Zaamurets) Armored Train](https://en.m.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zaamurets)

title: deadpool
body:
[i]I always forget (or just black out to spare myself the agony) what Wilson's most [b]lethal weapon[/b] is... his [b]mouth![/b] He'll talk nonsense until you surrender or commit suicide.[/i]
--[[domino (marvel)|Domino]] 

[b]Deadpool[/b] is a mercenary and anti-hero appearing in comic books published by [[marvel|Marvel Comics]]. Created by artist Rob Liefeld and writer Fabian Nicieza, Deadpool (Wade Wilson) first appeared in [i]The New Mutants[/i] #98 (Feb. 1991).

A disfigured and mentally unstable mercenary with the ability to quickly regenerate himself, Deadpool originally appeared as a villain in an issue of [i]New Mutants[/i], and later in issues of [i]X-Force[/i]. The character has since starred in several ongoing series, and shares titles with other characters such as [[cable (marvel)|Cable]]. The character, known as the "Merc with a Mouth", is famous for his talkative nature and his tendency to "break the [[fourth wall]]", which is used by writers for humorous effect.

With his inclusion in [[Marvel vs. Capcom 3|Marvel vs. Capcom 3]] his ability to break the fourth wall has been taken to "a whole new level.":http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=S66LtJ77mRk The character would later achieve even greater success after his [[deadpool (movie)|2016 film of the same name]], followed up by two sequels, [[Deadpool 2|one in 2018]] and [[Deadpool & Wolverine|another in 2024]].

title: german_shepherd
body:
The German Shepherd, also known in Britain as an Alsatian, is a German breed of working [[dog]] of medium to large size. The breed was developed by Max von Stephanitz using various traditional German herding dogs from 1899.
 The ears are rather large and stand erect. The back is level and muscular, and the tail is bushy and curves downward. The coat is thick and rough and may be black, tan, black and tan or gray. The coat should be harsh and of medium length; however, long-coated individuals occur often.

The breed is commonly used by [[military]], [[police]] and emergency services for [[K9 (dog)|]].

As the sheriff of the city of Piltover, she fights crime with her loud and overly rebellious law enforcement partner [[vi_(league_of_legends)|Vi]], using for this purpose her firearm proficiency, her multipurpose rifle and her cupcake-mounted traps. title: broccodess
body:
[[Reiwa no Di Gi Charat]] character, though she existed for a good few years before that series. The goddess of the company Broccoli. Also sometimes appears disguised as [[Dejiko]] but with red eyes, especially during 2008-2013, when she is canonically said to have been filling in for Dejiko.

Her version of Dejiko's costume is also slightly different, having white stripes on the bows and a blue stripe on the skirt/apron. Instead of the cat hat, she usually wears a maid headdress when disguised as Dejiko.

title: sigil
body: A type of printed or painted symbol believed to have some sort of magical power. Usually associated with the [[occult]] or [[magic]], such as [[angel|angels]], [[demon|demons]], or other supernatural beings.

title: zip.22_(doki_doki_after_dark)_(girls'_frontline)
body:
[[ZiP.22 (girls' frontline)|]]'s first skin from [[Girls' Frontline]], as part of the 'Phantom Thief Artistry' skin collection from 2024.

She wears a [[black coat]] [[hooded coat|with a]] [[blue hood|blue]] [[rabbit hood]], [[black thighhighs]] under [[blue footwear|blue]] [[roller shoes|roller]] [[knee boots]], and a [[domino mask]].

title: master_gundam
body:
A fictional manned giant robot from the [[Gundam]] [[mecha]]verse.

[b]GF13-001NHII Master Gundam[/b]

A [[mobile_suit|Mobile Fighter]] created by Neo [[Hong Kong]] for the [[g_gundam|13th Gundam Fight.]] Built to suit the formidable martial artist, [[master asia|the Undefeated of the East, Master Asia]], it was exceptionally agile and powerful. Its arsenal included hand beam cannons and the comical Master Cloth - a beam weapon shaped like Master Asia's belt, used for a variety of purposes due to his versatile and wide-ranged fighting style.

She wears a [[sleeveless dress|sleeveless]] [[blue dress]], [[black footwear|black]] [[high heel boots]], [[black goves]], and an [[asymmetrical mask|asymmetrical]] [[domino mask]] .

title: the_bends_(album)
body: "The Bends" its the Second album released on 1995 by English Alternative rock band [[Radiohead (Band)|Radiohead]], the album was a important mark of the Band's Popularity across the world, with the themes about an reflection on the effects of fame and consumerism on modern relationships., the Album was popularized the Hits "High and Dry", Fake Plastic Trees", "My Iron Lung" and "Street Spirit (Fade Out), its famous for its [[album cover]], which feautures an Hospital CPR Doll photographed on Polaroid Camera.

title: sombra_(overwatch)
body:
Playable character in [[Overwatch]], first introduced in [[Overwatch 1]] on November 15, 2016.

One of the world's most notorious hackers, Sombra uses information to manipulate those in power. Formerly a gang member in Mexico, Sombra stumbled upon a global web of conspiracy and was burned. She went into hiding, became a [[cyborg]], and joined the terrorist organization Talon, working alongside [[Reaper (Overwatch)|Reaper]], [[Widowmaker_(Overwatch)|Widowmaker]], and [[Doomfist (Overwatch)|Doomfist]]. 

h4. Alternate skins
* [[Augmented Sombra]] / [[Cyberspace Sombra]]
* [[Los Muertos Sombra]] / [[Azucar Sombra]]

title: melody_pianissima
body:
A portrait ghost to be captured in [i][[Luigi's Mansion]][/i]. 

Known as the [b]Beautiful Pianist[/b], she is a talented musician who excels at playing the [[piano]]. Despite her beauty her personality is quite unpleasant and she is arrogant about her talents. She is a big lover of video games and challenges [[Luigi]] to a trivia game to see if he can correctly identify what classic [[mario (series)|Mario]] tune she is playing.

Her notable trademarks are having [[long_hair|long]] [[blonde hair]], [[ghost|ghostly]] [[blue skin]], [[glowing_eyes|glowing]] [[yellow eyes]] that [[solid_eyes|lack pupils]] and a [[purple dress|purple]] [[long dress|dress]] that has a [[black bow]].

Shivers, another Portrait Ghost roaming the mansion, is madly in love with her.

Called [b]Pian[/b] (ピアン) in Japanese.

title: 2te116
body:
The [[2TE116]] is a broad gauge double [[Diesel Locomotive|diesel]] [[locomotive]] manufactured by Luhanskteplovoz (Luhansk Locomotive Works), used extensively to haul heavy freight trains in the Soviet Union and its successor states, particularly by [[Russian Railways|RZD]]

H4. Examples:
* !asset #23949379: Early Design
* !asset #23949386: Late Design

H4. See Also
* [[Russian Railways]]
* [[Diesel Locomotive]]

title: morinaka_kazaki_(2nd_costume)
body:
The second [[official alternate costume|costume]] of [[Nijisanji]]'s [[Morinaka Kazaki]], and the first to use her 15-year-old "self":[https://twitter.com/kazakimorinaka/status/999258892897927169] as the wearer, revealed on her birthday, May 23, 2018, two months after her debut.

It consists of a [[green camisole]], a [[pink cardigan]], a [[necklace]], [[frilled shorts|frilled]] [[pink shorts|pink]] [[short shorts]], and [[white socks|white]] and [[pink socks|pink]] [[striped socks]]. Her hair is tied up in [[double bun|double buns]] with [[pink scrunchie|pink]] [[hair scrunchie|hair scrunchies]] and a blue [[hairclip]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #3136323
* !post #3136325: Reference sheet

title: morinaka_kazaki_(1st_costume)
body:
The first and original default costume of [[Nijisanji]]'s [[Morinaka Kazaki]], as seen in post #3547394 and post #4132904, which she used from March 2018 to August 2019 when it was replaced by [[morinaka kazaki (8th costume)|a new default costume]]. Both this and her following default place her default age at 10.

It consists of a [[pink hoodie|pink]], [[striped hoodie]] with a [[bear hood]] and fake bear claws, [[pink shorts]], and [[pink footwear|pink]], [[striped footwear|striped]], bear paw-themed footwear.

title: kuzuha_(nijisanji)
body:
A [[virtual YouTuber]] who originally started as an [[indie virtual youtuber|indie]] before joining [[Nijisanji]] through [[Nijisanji Gamers]], before that whole branch was absorbed into Nijisanji proper. Designed by [[Loalo]].

He has [[short hair|short]] [[white hair]] and [[red eyes]]. Because he's a [[vampire]], he has [[pointy ears]] and [[fangs]]. There's a [[mole under eye|mole]] located under his right eye.

title: morinaka_kazaki_(adult)
body:
The 22-year-old alternate version of [[Nijisanji]]'s [[Morinaka Kazaki]], chronologically her 12th and 13th costumes.

The design of her 22-year-old version was teased during her "2021 birthday stream":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8ybM_dVzLa4]. Her 22-year-old's self's 3D model debuted first at her 1st VR LIVE show, Gekokujou (下剋上), in February 2022, before being publicly revealed during her "2022 birthday stream":[https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=UmQWlBmryJU]. She later gained a 2D model on March 15, 2023, one with a different appearance to her 3D version.

In her 2D form, her 22-year-old self has [[long hair|long]] [[green hair|green]] and [[pink hair|pink]] [[gradient hair]] tied in a [[braid]] on her left with a [[black ribbon|black]] [[hair ribbon]]. Her default costume consists of a [[black shirt|black]] [[crop top]], a [[black choker]], a [[white jacket]] with a [[bear print]], a [[black skirt]], [[multiple belts|multiple]] [[black belt|black belts]], a [[single thighhigh|single]] [[fishnet thighhighs|fishnet thighhigh]] on her right leg and an [[o-ring]] [[thigh strap]] on her left leg, and [[black footwear|black]] [[boots]].

h4. Appearance

* !post #6188398: 12th costume profile
* !post #6146740: 13th costume profile

title: artoria_caster_(fate)
body:
Caster-class variant of [[Artoria Pendragon (fate)|]], introduced during the [[Fate/Grand Order]] 5th Anniversary event. First debuted in the second opening of [i]Cosmos in the Lostbelt[/i] and is a major character in [i]Lostbelt no. 6: Avalon le Fae[/i].

She is an alternate version of Artoria who was chosen by the Staff of Selection instead of the Sword of Selection, leading her to study magic instead of becoming a knight. Notably, she does not bear the Pendragon name, unlike her selves from Proper Human History. [spoiler]This is because Artoria Caster is completely unrelated to the Artoria from Proper Human History; she was created explicitly to fulfill the prophecy of Faerie Britain and destroy the Lostbelt, a mission originally assigned to [[Aesc (fate)|Lostbelt]] [[Morgan le Fay (Fate)|Morgan]] that she abandoned.[/spoiler]

Her outfit changes based on her Ascension level:

* [[artoria caster (first ascension) (fate)|Stage 1]]: post #4044394
* [[artoria caster (second ascension) (fate)|Stage 2]]: post #4044400
* [[artoria caster (third ascension) (fate)|Stage 3]]: post #4044419
* Stage 4: post #4044420

h4. Variations

* [[artoria caster (swimsuit berserker) (fate)|Summer]]

* [[artoria caster (springtime koto strings) (fate)|Springtime Koto Strings]]
* [[artoria caster (counter stretch) (fate)|Counter Stretch]]

* [[Marmyadose (fate)|]]

h4. External links

* "Fate/Grand Order Wikia: Artoria Caster":[https://fategrandorder.fandom.com/wiki/Artoria_Caster]

title: quetzalcoatl_(fate)
body:
Rider-class Servant seen in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. A god from [[Aztec]] mythology who loves humans and grants them his blessings. Quetzalcoatl is depicted as female here, and she loathes her fellow god [[Tezcatlipoca (fate)|]] due to their differing beliefs on human sacrifice.

Gains a [[quetzalcoatl (samba/santa) (fate)|Ruler-class Santa Samba]] variant in the [[Christmas]] 2018 event.

title: artoria_pendragon_(lancer_alter)_(fate)
body:
[[Saber (fate)| Artoria Pendragon]] in [[Dark Persona| Alter state]] as a Lancer-class Servant. She uses King Arthur's spear [[Rhongomyniad (fate)|]] instead of [[Excalibur (fate/stay night)|]]. This aspect of Artoria is [[large breasts| much more developed]] than normal, supposedly due to not possessing the age-halting [[Caliburn (fate)|]] and [[avalon (fate)|Avalon]]. Battles while mounted on a horse named [[llamrei (fate)|Llamrei]]. Her actions as the Storm King allowed her to head the Wild Hunt after her passing.

[b]Design:[/b] [[Ishida Akira]]
[b]Voice:[/b] [[Kawasumi Ayako]]

title: saber_alter
body:
An alternate, evil version of [[Saber (fate)|]] from [[Fate/stay night]].

Wears black plate [[armor]] with veins of red. Has [[yellow eyes]]. Doesn't have an [[ahoge]]. Her usual clothing is a black [[gothic lolita]] apparel, which was "revealed":https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Artoria_Pendragon_Alter_(Saber)?file=AlterCasual.png#Casual in [[Fate/Hollow Ataraxia]] along with her love of junk food, particularly [[burger]]s.

[b]Do not use this tag for [[Santa Alter]] or [[Artoria Pendragon (Alter Swimsuit Rider) (fate)|]], unless they are depicted together or are [[cosplay|cosplaying]] as each other.[/b]

title: stomach
body:
An exposed frontal abdomen, specifically the area around the [[navel]] and above the [[groin]]. For images pertaining to the internal organ itself, use [[stomach_(organ)]].

Should only be used when the stomach is a prominent, noticeable part of the image, not merely in the background or partially exposed.

Unlike [[midriff]], [[stomach]] can be used when the stomach is visible between [[underwear]], [[bikini]]s, and when the character is [[nude]], [[bottomless]], or [[topless]] ([[topless male]] for male characters).

h4. See also

* [[abs]]
* [[belly]]
* [[midriff]]
* [[navel]]
* [[obliques]]

title: multiple_heads
body:
A character with more than one head/neck, sometimes in unconventional locations, like at the end of a [[tail]]. Commonly seen on monsters and fantasy animals such as the mythical [[Cerberus]] and [[Hydra]], or [[Dodrio]].

Not to be confused with [[extra faces]], to which the character may have more faces compared to the head it possess.

title: animdude
body:
Scott Braden Cawthon (Born June 4, 1978, in Bell County, Texas), also known under the username "Animdude," is an American game developer, author, animator, screenwriter, and film producer who is the creator and original developer of the Five Nights at Freddy's franchise, including the Clickteam era of games, spin-offs, and troll games.

This tag is used for depictions of Scott as a character, most often represented by the character Animdude, whom he uses as his avatar. For his art, see [[Scott Cawthon]].

title: donkey_kong_jr._(game)
body:
The second Donkey Kong arcade game and sequel to [i][[donkey_kong_(1981_game)|Donkey Kong]][/i], released in 1982. 

[[Mario]] has imprisoned [[Donkey Kong]], which prompts his son [[Donkey Kong Jr.]] to set out to save him. A platformer like the previous entry, he must avoid enemies, jump over obstacles and climb vines in order to take the key away from Mario to break his father out of his cage. 

Notable for being one of the few games where Mario is the antagonist.

body:
A Vietnamese [[indie virtual youtuber|indie VTuber]]. Her character model was designed by [[kannazuki_genshi|Kannazuki Genshi]]. 

She has two forms: humanoid form and cat form. Originally she was a black cat who is addicted to eating strawberry to the point she become a pink cat and able to speak human language. After sometime she evolved into a humanoid form. She has two personalities depending on her eyes color (red eyes for fiery personality but that eyes were formerly yellow, blue eyes for her normal persona of cuteness and friendliness)

title: hawlean_province
body:
Character in the [[Rance (series)|Rance series]], introduced in [[Kichikuou Rance]] and reintroduced in [[Rance 10]].

In both games, Hawlean (or Haurein in the English version) is a strict, dutiful commander of the Leazas White Army, and the estranged daughter of [[Barres Province]]. In [i]Kichikuou[/i], she participates in the rebellion against King [[Rance]] at the start of the game, led by her superior [[Ex Banquet]].

title: moechakkafire
body:
A song by Japanese musician Issey, released on July 23, 2024. Themed to [[Ellen Joe]], one of the playable characters in the 2024 action game [[Zenless Zone Zero]], where it is sung in her perspective about her work at the Victoria Housekeeping Co., one of the playable factions in the game.

The animation for the music video is done by [[Hatsumino]], released on the same day, and features Ellen alongside the other members - [[Von Lycaon]], [[Alexandrina Sebastiane]] (also known as Rina for short), and [[Corin Wickes]].

h4. External links

* "MoeChakkaFire / issey：MUSIC VIDEO 『Zenless Zone Zero』Ellen Joe image song":[https://youtu.be/wZlv3qDPfjk]

title: caitlin_(pokemon)
body:
[b]Caitlin[/b], known as [b]Cattleya[/b] (カトレア) in Japan, is a character introduced in [i][[pokemon platinum|Pokémon Platinum]][/i].

One of the Unova Pokémon League Elite Four, this refined young lady overcame her past weaknesses and became a stronger Trainer [tn](official bio)[/tn]. 

In [[pokemon bw|BW]], she has [[blue eyes]] and [[very long hair|long]] [[wavy hair|wavy]] [[blonde hair]] with [[parted bangs]] and [[sidelocks]]. She wears a [[pink headwear|pink]] [[hat]], [[butterfly hair ornament|butterfly hair ornaments]], a [[see-through cape|transparent]] [[pink cape]], a [[long sleeves|long-sleeve]] [[white dress|dress]], and [[pink footwear|pink]] [[wedge heels]] (post #5196529).

title: big_al
body:
BIG AL is an English [[VOCALOID]] developed and distributed by PowerFX Systems AB, and was released for the VOCALOID2 engine. 

His avatar is based on [[Frankenstein's monster]]. His second appearance was illustrated by Accelagirl while his [[big_al_(e-capsule)|third]], a Taiwanese appearance, was illustrated by Taiwanese artist, [[Loiza]]. He has [[short hair|short]] [[brown hair]] with white sideburns and [[yellow eyes]]. He wears gold [[headphones]] and a [[necklace]], both which have a [[skull]] motif. Connected to his [[belt]] are a string of [[bullet]]s.

h4. See also

* [[Big Al (e-capsule)]]

title: suou_yuki
body:
A deuteragonist in [[Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san]]. She is [[Kuze Masachika]]'s younger [[brother and sister|sister]] (their surnames differ due to their parents' divorce). Notable for her "[[brocon|brother complex]]" and fondness in teasing her older brother, sometimes even in a [[female pervert|perverted]] way.

She has [[black eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] usually tied in a [[ponytail]], and [[medium breasts]]. 

h4.Family
Kyoutarou Kuze (Father)
[[Suou Yumi]] (Mother)
Masachika Kuze (Older brother)

h4.See also
* [[Good Morning My Brother! (meme)]]

title: kenzaki_touya
body:
Supporting character from [[Tokidoki Bosotto Roshia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san|Roshidere]].

A second-year student at the Seirei Private Academy, serving as the incumbent student council's president.

Depicted as a fairly-built tall young man with [[black hair]] and [[black eyes]] with [[glasses]]. Often seen donning the male [[Seiren Academy school uniform]]. Prior to becoming the student council president, he is rather [[fat man|chubby]].

title: toga_himiko
body:
One of the antagonists from [[Boku no Hero Academia]]. 

She has [[blonde hair]] that she wears done up in a [[messy hair|messy]] [[double bun]] along with [[blunt bangs]] and [[sidelocks]], [[yellow eyes]] that are often [[narrowed_eyes|narrowed]] or with [[sanpaku|tightened irises]] and [[slit pupils]], made up with black [[eyeliner]] or with [[bags_under_eyes|bags under her eyes]]. She frequently [[blush]]es and [[smile]]s baring her teeth that feature prominent [[fangs]]. 

She typically wears a [[serafuku]] with a [[blue sailor collar]] and [[red neckerchief]] with a [[yellow_cardigan|yelllow]] [[cardigan]] sweater over it, and a [[blue_skirt|blue]] [[pleated skirt]].  She also wears [[black_socks|black]] [[kneehighs]] and [[brown_footwear|brown]] [[loafers]].

She carries a [[knife]], and when equipped to fight, she usually wears a [[black_bandana|black]] [[bandana]] [[bandana_over_mouth|over her mouth]] or around her neck printed with [[teeth]], sometimes a [[black_mask|black]] [[mouth mask]], a [[green belt]] with [[belt pouch]]es, [[thigh strap]]s with  [[thigh pouch]]es, and a back mounted [[tank_(container)|]] connected by [[hose]]s to [[canister]]s on her shoulders that act as [[syringe]]s.

Her quirk allows her to [[transformation|transform]] to look like anyone whose [[blood]] she drinks.

title: dlanor_a._knox
body:
Character from [[Umineko no Naku Koro Ni]]. Leader of the [[Eiserne Jungfrau]] (Iron Maidens) and is named after "Ronald A. Knox":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Ronald_Knox, who wrote the famous "Knox Decalogue":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Golden_Age_of_Detective_Fiction#Description_of_the_genre, a list of "rules" that mysteries should follow in order to be solvable.

She has [[purple hair]] which is styled into [[drill hair|drills]]. Normally she seems cold and emotionless, but can sometimes become rather terrifying. She is famous for her english catchphrase "Die The death! Sentence to death! Great equalizer is The Death!!"
other_names: ドラノール・A・ノックス

title: rudy_the_clown
body:
The final boss of [[Wario Land 3]] and [[Dr. Mario 64]]. His power was sealed away by the citizens of the Music Box World due to his prior attempt in trying to take it over.

A grotesque [[clown]]-like being covered in [[skull]] ornaments. He has a [[big_nose|large]] [[red nose]], [[thick_lips|big lips]] and [[horn_(instrument)|horn]]s for ears. His face has [[green skin]] and his eyes are [[red_sclera|blood red]]. 

His sprite in-game [[disembodied hand|lacks arms]] due to hardware limitations, becoming a defining unique trait.

[spoiler]He is the one that has been posing as the Hidden Figure in The Temple, helping and guiding you throughout the game.[/spoiler]

h4. External links
* "Super Mario Wiki: Rudy":[https://www.mariowiki.com/Rudy]

title: medium_hair
body:
Hair that is approximately shoulder-length. Hair extending past that point should be tagged as [[long hair]].

h4. Examples

!post #7352787: [[short hair|"Default" (short)]], [[short hair|short]], [[medium hair|medium]], [[long hair]].

h4. Hair lengths

* [[bald]] / [[bald girl]]
* [[very short hair]]
* [[short hair]] (shorter than shoulder length)
* [[medium hair]] (shoulder length)
* [[long hair]] (longer than shoulder length, up to waist length)
* [[very long hair]] (longer than waist length, up to floor length)
* [[absurdly long hair]] (beyond floor length)

h4. See also 

* [[Tag Group:Hair Styles]]

title: short_hair
body:
Hair reaching the neck, but not reaching the shoulders.

Short hairstyles include the [[bob cut]], the [[bowl cut]], the [[flattop]], and the [[undercut]].

If the hair is ear length or shorter, use [[very short hair]].

h4. Examples

!post #7352787: [[short hair|"Default" (short)]], [[short hair|short]], [[medium hair|medium]], [[long hair]].

h4. Hair lengths

* [[bald]] / [[bald girl]] (no hair whatsoever)
* [[very short hair]] (shorter than jaw/chin length)
* [[short hair]] (shorter than shoulder length)
* [[medium hair]] (shoulder length)
* [[long hair]] (longer than shoulder length, up to waist length)
* [[very long hair]] (longer than waist length, up to floor length)
* [[absurdly long hair]] (beyond floor length)

title: windows_3.x
body:
The catch-all name for versions of [[Microsoft Windows]] utilizing "Program Manager":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Program_Manager] shell as the main graphics [[user interface]] starting from Windows 3.0 released in 1990 up until Windows NT 3.51 in 1995.

Use this tag for depictions of the user interfaces, logos, or mentions of the aforementioned Windows versions.

h4. See also
* [[3.1-tan]]

title: grave_(nikke)
body:
An playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]

A mysterious Nikke who wanders the surface with a huge coffin on her back.

In pursuit of her hidden objectives, her stealth and evasion skills are unmatched by ordinary individuals.  

[spoiler]It was revealed that she is [[Abe (nikke)|]], a mass-produced [[Product 23 (nikke)|Product 23]] who was the Chief researcher and the creator of the [[Old tales (nikke)|]] squad, the second-generation grimms models.[/spoiler]

title: bedivere_(fate)
body:
[[Fate/stay night]] character, and an available Servant in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. He was one of [[Saber (fate)|]]'s knights of the Round Table. Has a very [[androgynous]] appearance to the point of either being a [[bishounen]] or even an [[otoko no ko]]. Is [[amputee|missing his right arm]] and is usually seen wearing a [[prosthetic arm|prosthesis]].

Voiced by [[Noto Mamiko]] in [[Fate/Stay Night]] and [[Miyano Mamoru]] in [[Fate/Grand Order]].

[spoiler]The version appearing in Fate/Grand Order is from a timeline where he never returned [[Excalibur (fate/stay night)|]] to the [[Lady of the Lake]], resulting in [[Artoria Pendragon (fate)|]] being unable to die. He ended up waiting in the Garden of Avalon with [[Merlin (fate)|]] for centuries until the events of the [[Camelot (fate/grand order)|]] singularity, where he was finally able to defeat Artoria, now having been taken over by the holy power of [[Rhongomyniad (fate)|]] and becoming the [[Lion King (lancer) (fate)|Lion King]].[/spoiler]

title: yulha_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. A Nikke from [[Triangle (nikke)|]] with [[Admi (Nikke)|]] and [[Privaty (Nikke)|]]. An office worker that suffers from work overload. She is the leader of Triangle, and a reliable leader at that. Others inexplicably refer to her as Ghost.

She has [[yellow eyes]], [[sharp teeth]], [[large breasts]], and [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair|grey]]/[[white hair|white]] [[messy hair]]. Wears a [[white coat| white]] [[coat on shoulders]], [[black footwear|black]] [[chaps]], a [[black leotard]] with [[navel cutout]], a [[red jacket|red]] [[cropped jacket]], carries a [[sniper rifle]] [[weapon on back|on her back]], [[black gloves]] and a [[belt]].

title: yan_(nikke)
body:
A playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: NIKKE]]. Part of the [[Talentum (nikke)|]] squad along with [[Rupee (Nikke)|]] and [[Dolla (Nikke)|]].

An experienced merchant with a knack for striking deals. She uses her business acumen to operate several large-scale supermarket chains. Talentum's rise to fame can all be traced back to her.

Like all members of Talentum, she is named after Yuan, a Chinese currency.

h4. Outfits

* [[Yan (Sunrise Market) (Nikke)|Sunrise Market]]

title: soda_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. 

A member of [[Maid For You (nikke)|]] along with [[Cocoa (Nikke)|]] and [[Ade (Nikke)|]], she's responsible primarily for domestic duties. She can almost always be seen with a permanent smile on her face, which never fades even when she makes the occasional mistake at work. This indefatigable cheeriness is infectious to those who hang around Soda.

She has [[purple eyes|purple]]/[[pink eyes]], [[large breasts|large]]/[[huge breasts]], and [[long hair|long]] [[green hair]] with a [[double bun]] held by [[hair ribbon]] and a pair of [[antenna hair]] with a [[hairclip]] close to them. She's a [[maid]] wearing typical apparel like a [[maid headdress]], a [[sleeveless ]] [[maid apron]] with [[frills]] that may or not have a [[button gap]] and a [[green ascot]] held by a [[breast strap]]. She also wears [[arm cuffs]], [[two-tone gloves|two-tone]] [[white gloves|white]] and [[black gloves]]. Also wears a [[black skirt|black]] [[pleated skirt]] and [[white thighhighs]].

h4. Official art

* !post #6050689: Default

title: zhang_chunhua
body:
Family name/Given name:  張 春華 ([i]Zhang ChunHua[/i])
Simplified Chinese: 张 春华
Japanese pronunciation: Chou Shunka
State: Cao Wei

A historical figure of the Three Kingdoms Period. The wife of [[Sima Yi]] and the mother of [[Sima Shi]], [[Sima_Zhao|Zhao]] and [[Sima_Gan|Gan]].  There are a few anecdotes about her erudition and fierce personality.

For the [[Shin Sangoku Musou]] (7~) character, use [[Zhang ChunHua (Shin Sangoku Musou)]]. For the [[Sangokushi Taisen]] character(s), use [[Zhang ChunHua (Sangokushi Taisen)]].

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia article":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zhang_Chunhua]

title: rosanna_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. 

Part of the [[Underworld Queen (nikke)|]] squad together with [[Sakura (Nikke)|]] and [[Moran (Nikke)|]] and Leader of Hedonia, a sizable criminal gang. Compared with other members of the Underworld Queen, she is far more pugnacious and firmly believes that violence is the ultimate panacea. She does, however, take exceedingly good care of those who are part of her gang.

title: flcl
body:
[b]FLCL[/b] (Furi Kuri, pronounced in English as Fooly Cooly) is a [[science fiction]] and comedy OVA series written by Yōji Enokido, directed by [[Tsurumaki Kazuya|]] and produced by the FLCL Production Committee, which included [[Gainax]], Production I.G, and Starchild Records. It was released in April 26, 2000.

FLCL follows Nandaba Naota, a twelve-year-old boy living in the fictional Japanese suburb of Mabase, and his interactions with Haruhara Haruko, who arrives in the quiet suburb, drawn by the industrial town houses and the Medical Mechanica building.

h4. Main Characters

* [[Nandaba Naota]]
* [[Haruhara Haruko]]
* [[Amarao]]
* [[Canti]]
* [[Atomsk]]
* [[Kitsurubami]]
* [[Samejima Mamimi]]

h4. Secondary Characters 

* [[Miyaji Junko]]
* [[Nandaba Kamon]]
* [[Nandaba Shigekuni]]
* [[Ninamori Eri]]
* [[Manabe Gaku]]
* [[Masamune Masashi]]

h4. Pets

* [[Takkun (flcl)|]]
* [[Miyu Miyu]]

h4. Sequels

* [[FLCL Progressive]]
* [[FLCL Alternative]]
* [[FLCL Grunge]]
* [[FLCL Shoegaze]]

h4. External links

* "Wikipedia: FLCL":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/FLCL]

title: haruhara_haruko
body:
[b]Haruhara Haruko[/b] ([[FLCL]]) is Mabase's newest resident, an extraterrestrial investigator for the Galactic Space Police Brotherhood. She becomes the Nandaba household maid while working to find Atomsk, the most powerful space pirate in the galaxy. 

She uses her [[bass guitar]] to create an N.O. portal in [[Nandaba Naota]]'s head, through which various objects periodically appear, including Medical Mechanica [[robot]]s and Naota's guitar, among others. Amarao states in episode 4 and episode 6 that Haruko's real name is "Raharu".

title: noise_(nikke)
body:
A playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

Member of the [[Prima Donna (nikke)|]] squad together with [[Volume (Nikke)|]] and [[Aria (Nikke)|]]. She is a perfectionist pop star, as well as a songwriter who writes her own original material. Apart from being a member of Prima Donna, her hit song "Diva" catapulted her into stardom.

She's a [[dark-skinned female]] with [[large breasts]] and [[blue eyes]]. She has [[multicolored hair]], with [[black hair]] and [[blonde hair|blonde]] [[colored inner hair]] which she wears with a [[high ponytail]]. She wears [[black shorts|black]] [[high-waist shorts]] and on top [[blue dress|blue]]/[[purple dress]] with a [[long skirt|long]] [[half-skirt]] . She wears a [[black bowtie]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves]], [[long fingernails|long]] [[fake nails]] with [[black nails|black]] and [[pink nails|pink]] [[nail polish]] and [[nail art]]. She wears a [[single earring]], a [[thigh pouch]] and a [[belt]] with a [[buckle]], and also [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]].

Illustrator: [[Yoya Yogurt]] (default) and [[K.pumpkin]] (Classic Diva)

title: captain_toad
body:
One of the many [[toad (mario)|Toads]] in the [[Mario_(series)|Mario]] franchise.

First appearing in [i][[Super Mario Galaxy]][/i], Captain Toad is a [[Red Toad (mario)|Red Toad]] who leads the adventurous Toad Brigade, who seeks to help out his kingdom whenever available. A bit of a coward. 

Later got his own spinoff game, [i][[Captain Toad: Treasure Tracker]][/i]. Because of his heavy backpack, he is unable to jump.

Do not confuse him for the Toad typically used as Mario and co.'s companion.

title: mica_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. A Nikke from the [[Carronades (nikke)|]] along with [[Belorta (Nikke)|]] who is extremely naive. Her sole friend and squadmate Belorta is the only one she will fully trust without hesitation.

She has [[blue eyes]], [[flat chest]], and [[long hair|long]] [[brown hair]] with [[sidelocks]], usually with typical military [[facepaint]]. She wears a [[black leotard|black]] [[thong leotard]] [[leotard under clothes|under her clothes]]. A [[red jacket|red]]/[[orange jacket|orange]] [[cropped jacket]], wears a [[helmet]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves]], a [[belt pouch]], [[thigh pouch]], [[thigh strap]], [[black thighhighs|black]] [[over-kneehighs]], [[black footwear]], and a [[knife sheath]].

title: folkwang_(nikke)
body:
A playable character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

An athlete from [[Nepenthe (nikke)|]] together with [[Epinel (Nikke)|]] and [[Rumani (Nikke)|]]. She is sweating all the time due to having no resistance to heat, but she is full of vigor.

She's a [[blue eyes|blue eyed]], [[large breasts|large breasted]] girl with [[long hair|long]] [[light purple hair]] with [[sidelocks]] and a [[braid]], held with a [[blue bow|blue]] [[hair bow]]. She wears a [[cropped shirt|cropped]] [[sleeveless shirt]], usually showing her [[underboob]] which she [[clothes pull|pulls]] because she can't handle her [[sweat|sweating]]. She wears [[fingerless gloves|fingerless]] [[two-tone gloves|two-tone]] [[blue gloves|blue]]/[[black gloves]]. She wears [[white pants]], a [[belt]] with a [[belt pouch]] and a [[buckle]]. Wears [[white footwear|white]]/[[blue footwear]]. Usually seen holding a [[bladeless fan]] and [[mouth hold|mouth holding]] [[popsicle]].

title: exia_(nikke)
body:
A character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. She is a genius hacker and member of [[Protocol (nikke)|]].

Always fond of video games, often spending her times playing video games. She addresses the [[commander (nikke)|]] as "Noob."

She has [[purple eyes]] and [[long hair|long]] [[black hair]] with [[hair between eyes]] & [[sidelocks]]. She wears a [[headset]]/[[headphones]], [[black choker]], a [[white shirt|white]] with a [[game controller print]], [[open jacket|open]] [[white jacket]], and [[black footwear|black]] [[sandals]]. She has a [[bandaid on knee]] and is usually depicted [[holding handheld game console|holding a handheld game console]].

title: dolla_(nikke)
body:
A playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: NIKKE]]. She is part of the [[Talentum (nikke)|]] squad along with [[Rupee (nikke)|]] and [[Yan (nikke)|]].

A true enterprising spirit. Rumor has it that she's a VIP of a large illegal website. She is the most rational member of Talentum. Like the other Talentum members, Dolla is named after the currency, "Dollar":[https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Dollar].

She has [[long hair|long]] [[purple hair]] tied in a [[ponytail]] and [[purple eyes]]. Her outfit consists of a [[black suit]] with [[white shirt]] that is [[see-through shirt|see-through]] thus her [[bra]] is [[bra visible through clothes|visible]], a [[necktie]], [[strap]]s, and [[black pants]].

h4.Outfits
* [[Dolla (dark rose) (nikke)|Dark Rose]]

title: toriyama_akira
body:
[b]Akira Toriyama[/b] (April 5, 1955 - March 1, 2024), mangaka, famous for the [i][[Dragon Ball]][/i] and [i][[Dr. Slump]][/i] manga. Worked on the character design for [i][[Dragon Quest]][/i], [i][[Chrono Trigger]][/i], [i][[Blue Dragon]][/i] and [i][[Tobal no. 1]][/i] series.

He passed away on March 1, 2024 at the age of 68 due to an acute subdural hematoma.

h4. See also
* [[Toriyama Akira (character)]] - for his [[artist self-insert|self-insert]].
* [[Toriyama Akira (style)]]

title: toriyama_akira_(style)
body:
Artwork done in the style of the late [[Toriyama Akira]], a popular and legendary artist well-known for series such as [[Dragon Ball]], [[Dragon Quest]], [[Chrono Trigger]], and [[Dr. Slump]] to name a few.

Can also be used for artwork referencing styles derivative of Toriyama's, such as the styles of the various animators that contributed to the Dragon Ball anime, but if a specific animator is being referenced, use their style tag instead.

title: aria_(nikke)
body:
A playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: NIKKE]]. Squadmates with [[Volume (Nikke)|]] and [[Noise (Nikke)|]].

An opera singer from [[Prima Donna (nikke)|]], where she plays the lead in every performance she's a part of. Her singing consistently garners standing ovations, making her a living legend in the world of opera.

She has [[black skin|black]]/[[grey skin]], [[long hair|long]] [[white hair|white]]/[[grey hair]] with [[sidelocks]] and [[hair behind ear]] and usually with [[hair over one eye]], [[grey eyes]], [[large breasts]] and a noticeable [[forehead]]. She wears a [[long sleeves|long sleeved]] [[frilled dress|frilled]] [[white dress]] with [[shoulder cutout]] and [[cleavage cutout]], a [[belt pouch]], [[white gloves]], [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]], [[white skirt|white]] and [[grey skirt|grey]] [[high-low skirt]], and a [[white choker]].

title: anis_(nikke)
body:
A character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. 

A member of the [[Counters (nikke)|]] squad along with [[rapi (nikke)|Rapi]] and [[neon (nikke)|Neon]], Anis is the most cocky and sarcastic among the three. Despite this, she is still loyal, obedient and caring to her squad, especially to the [[commander (nikke)|commander]].

She has [[yellow eyes|yellow]]/[[brown eyes]], [[huge breasts]], and [[short hair|short]] [[brown hair]] with [[bangs]]. She wears a [[black headwear|black]] [[beret]], [[black jacket]], [[grey shirt|grey]]/[[white shirt|white]] [[crop top]], [[black shorts|black]] [[short shorts]], [[black gloves|black]] [[fingerless gloves]], [[black thighhighs]], [[thigh strap]]s, and [[black footwear|black]] [[high heels]]. Depicted [[holding gun|holding]] a [[grenade launcher]] and has several [[40mm grenade]]s strapped to her default gear.

body:

He wears a trench coat or skinsuit, has [[black_hair|black]] [[short hair]] and doesn't remember much of his past.

title: alice_(nikke)
body:
A character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]] and a member of the [[Unlimited (nikke)|]] squad along with [[Ludmilla (nikke)|]], [[Neve (nikke)|]], and [[Tove (Nikke)|]]. 

She seems to look at the world as if it's a fairy tale as evidenced by calling her fellow colleague as "Queen", the [[Commander (nikke)|]] as "Rabbity", and the leader of the [[rapture (nikke)|]]s as "The Queen of hearts".

She has [[pink eyes]], [[medium breasts]], and [[long hair|long]] [[grey hair]] stylized in [[twintails]] with [[bangs]] & [[sidelocks]]. She wears a [[pink bodysuit]] that is [[skin tight]], [[animal ear headphones]], a [[red jacket|red]]/[[pink jacket|pink]] [[cropped jacket]], [[pink gloves|pink]] & [[white gloves|white]] [[two-tone gloves]], and [[white footwear|white]] [[sneakers]]. Sometimes depicted [[holding gun|holding]] a [[rifle]].

title: ade_(nikke)
body:
A playable character from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

She is a member of [[Maid For You (Nikke)|]], consisting of her, [[Cocoa (nikke)|]], [[Soda (nikke)|]], and [[Privaty (Unkind Maid) (Nikke)|Privaty]]. Unlike the other three, Ade is more professional in her duty as a maid.

Like all members of Maid For You, Ade's name is taken from the -ade suffix, usually used in citrus beverages.

She has [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] tied in a [[braid]] with [[green eyes]] and [[large_breasts|large]]/[[huge breasts]]. She wears a [[maid|maid outfit]] consisting of a [[maid headdress|frilled headdress]], [[black shirt]], [[long skirt|long]] [[frilled skirt]], and a pair of [[black footwear|black shoes]].

title: tia_(nikke)
body:
A character in [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]]. A member of [[dazzling_pearl_(nikke)|Dazzling Pearl]] along with [[Naga (nikke)|Naga]].

A Nikke belonging to the graduating class, [[Dazzling Pearl (nikke)|]] squad. A food enthusiast who's fond of sweets. Her dream is to see a dragon one day and make a wish to it.

title: angelina_(nikke)
body:
A character from [[Goddess of Victory: Nikke]].

[[N102 (nikke)|Anne]]'s biological mother. Currently a 45-year old single mother. [spoiler]When Anne was diagnosed with a neurodegenerative disease, Angelina submitted her daughter to become a Nikke, hoping the process would cure her disease. As a result of the medical expenses incurred keeping her daughter's health stable, Angelina tries to work different jobs in order to pay for Anne's memory wipes. However, it appears that the periodic memory wipes necessary to save her life are not improving her condition at all.[/spoiler]

She has [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] [[tied hair|tied]] [[hair over shoulder|over her shoulder]] with [[blue eyes]]. Her outfit consists of a [[red shirt]] with [[bowtie]] and a long [[brown skirt]]. She carries a [[purse]] along with a brown [[notebook]] with her, similarly to her daughter.

She has [[blue eyes]], [[long hair|long]] [[blonde hair]] with [[sidelocks]] which is tied in [[twintails]] held by metallic headgear (not ribbons). Like other members of Matis, Laplace is named after a famous scientist, namely [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Pierre-Simon_Laplace](Pierre-Simon Laplace), who is known for the Laplace equation and Laplace transform.

title: luigi's_mansion
body:
A subseries in the [[Mario_(series)|Mario]] franchise, starring [[Luigi]] as the main character. In the game, Luigi goes through a haunted mansion to rescue [[Mario]] - who is trapped in a painting by [[King Boo]] - by using a vacuum cleaner called the [[Poltergust 3000]], which is used to catch [[ghost|ghosts]]. 

h4. Games

* [b]Luigi's Mansion[/b]: The original game for the Nintendo [[Gamecube]] released in 2001, featuring the [[Poltergust 3000]], and the infamous Mansion known across the franchise.
* [b][[Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon|Luigi's Mansion 2]][/b] ([b]Dark Moon[/b] in America): The [[Nintendo 3DS]] sequel released in 2013, now going through a mission-based storyline across 5 new mansions and the debut of the [[Poltergust 5000]].
* [b]Luigi's Mansion Arcade[/b]: The [[arcade_cabinet |arcade]] game released in 2015. A [[light gun]] shooter based on Luigi's Mansion: Dark Moon, featuring much of the same locations, enemies and story.
* [b]Luigi's Mansion 3DS[/b]: A 3DS remake of the original Gamecube game in 2018, including all the original mechanics as well as improved graphics and the debut of [[Gooigi]].
* [b][[Luigi's Mansion 3]][/b]: A Halloween 2019 release, taking the setting inside a Haunted Hotel, and introducing the [[Poltergust G-00]], further introducing Gooigi as a major mechanic in the game.

h4. See also

* [[Princess King Boo]]

title: queen_draco_(fate)
body:
Beast-class servant in [[Fate/Grand Order Arcade]]. Initially appears as an [[aged down]] version of [[Nero Claudius (Fate/Extra)|]], but this is considered her immature state. Her mature form is referred to as [b][[queen draco (beast vi/s) (fate)|Beast VI/S]][/b], with the S representing "Sodom":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Sodom_and_Gomorrah.

The immature form of Queen Draco can be obtained as a welfare SSR Alter Ego Servant - as of this writing, the only five-star rarity welfare Servant throughout all of FGO and FGOA. She is later introduced into the mobile game as a summonable Beast-class Servant, making her the first playable Beast in the entire franchise, with a unique summoning animation included. The character card for the Beast class uses her matured Beast VI/S form as the representative.

title: locusta_(fate)
body:
Assassin-class Servant introduced in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. [[Nero Claudius (fate)|]]' personal poisons expert and purportedly history's first serial killer. She was responsible for the assassinations of Nero's father Claudius at Agrippina the Younger's behest, and Claudius' son Britannicus, born from his third wife Valeria Messalina, at Nero's behest. Along with Nero's other 'favorites', Locusta was eventually executed for her crimes following Nero's suicide.

title: van_gogh_(fate)
body:
Foreigner-class Servant seen in [[Fate/Grand Order]]. She is a [[genderswap (mtf)|]]ped version of [[Vincent Van Gogh (person)|]], a Dutch post-impressionist painter who is among the most famous and influential figures in the history of Western art, though he was considered a failure and a madman during his lifetime. His most famous paintings include [i]The Starry Night[/i], [i]Cafe Terrace at Night[/i], and the [i]Sunflowers[/i] series.

[spoiler]It is revealed later that the named servant is not in anyway related to Van Gogh but instead is "Clytie":https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Clytie_(Oceanid), a water nymph and daughter of Oceanus and Tethys from Greek Mythology, and her existence is more in line with the [[passionlip (fate)|Alter]] [[meltryllis (fate)|Egos]] where they are [[kingprotea (fate)|goddesses]] and [[sitonai (fate)|deities]] forced into a mixed existence of human form. 

[[Vincent Van Gogh (person)|]] in [[Fate (series)|]] has the ability to transform Servants into Gods through his artwork thus he was targeted by the Outer Gods who desired him for their plans. However, rather than submitting to their wills, he killed himself in an act of defiance that carried over with him even as a Heroic Spirit forcing the Outer Gods to instead create another "Van Gogh" using his powers and memories and mixing his "Spirit Origin/Saint Graph":https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Saint_Graph with that of Clytie's, creating a cruel combination of Clytie (her body), "Vincent"(his abilities) and with power of that of an "Outer God/Foreigners'":https://typemoon.fandom.com/wiki/Foreigner 

Their being as a Servant thus becomes an endless struggle of conflicting existence, where Vincent will constantly try to kill himself by various curses (as seen from their first ability; Void Space Fine Arts), and Clytie, who is determined to stay alive, will defy his attempts (gaining self "Guts").

[/spoiler]

h4.Variants

title: tate_eboshi
body:
A tate-eboshi (立烏帽子, lit. "standing eboshi cap") is a tall, straight hat worn by Japanese male aristocrats since the "Heian Period":[http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heian_period]. Afterwards, various types of eboshi were born, e.g. [i]Kazaori eboshi (Samurai eboshi), Okina eboshi[/i], etc. [i]Tate eboshi[/i] is the best-known one. This headdress came about in the "Heian period":http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Heian_period based on headgear known as a [i]hashiha-kouburi[/i] (圭冠).

Kanmuri are official hats worn in the imperial court and eboshi are casual headdresses worn by the nobility and it was also worn by the normal people. The Mikado never uses an eboshi. [b]Danbooru currently does not distinguish [i]eboshi[/i] from ancient Japanese [i]kanmuri[/i] (冠).[/b]

Physically, the kanmuri stands out thanks to the "koji (巾子)", a cylindrical shape that stands upright from the top of the headwear, and the "ei (纓)", string-shaped cloth which hangs down from the rear of the headwear towards the wearer's back. The Japanese at the time when kanmuri were still simple sack-like shapes had a topknot on their head. They wore kanmuri by putting the topknot through a tube and binding the root of the topknot wearing this sack and letting the rest of the string hang down their backs. The terms "koji" and "ei", which were used even when the shape and quality of the kanmuri changed, serve as a reminder of this older form. 

Notably worn by [[Mononobe no Futo]] and [[Soga no Tojiko]] of the [[Touhou]] series.

h4. See also

* [[hina ningyou]]
* [[Tag Group:Attire]]
* For a legendary figure, nicknamed "Tate Eboshi", see [[Suzuka Gozen]].

h4. External links

title: color_coordination
body:
Characters and/or objects match each other in color, or create a sense of symmetry.

The characters/objects must be put into multiple pairs/groups based on their color to create the sense of "coordination". If there is only one group of characters/object put together based on their color, use [[color connection]] and the corresponding "color theme":/tags?search[name_matches]=*_theme&search[category]=0&search[hide_empty]=yes&search[order]=name&commit=Search if applicable.

If it's an art centring around a specific color without the intention of "connection", use the corresponding "color theme":/tags?search[name_matches]=*_theme&search[category]=0&search[hide_empty]=yes&search[order]=name&commit=Search instead. For instance, post #4734135 is [[yellow theme]].

If there're multiple color groups but the characters are simply cosplaying and their matching pair isn't present (e.g. post #1490134), use [[color connection]] instead.

This technique is often associated with [[lineup]] and [[column lineup]], such as post #5485339. When the columns are each completely monochromatically themed on a single color, it becomes [[multiple monochrome]].

If the coordinated colors are also forming a rainbow, it's also [[rainbow order]].

h5. Examples

title: reverse_palettes
body:
Two color palettes that are (approximatively) the exact reverse of each other, often used on [[matching outfits]]. 

The palettes should be alternating, if they each have an independent theme color, they're not "reversed". But it might be [[color coordination]] instead. Compare post #6313479 and post #6313481.

title: paul_rudd
body:
Paul Stephen Rudd (born April 6, 1969) is an American actor. He studied theater at the University of Kansas and the American Academy of Dramatic Arts before making his acting debut in 1991. He received a star on the Hollywood Walk of Fame in July 2015, and was included on the Forbes Celebrity 100 list in 2019. In 2021, he was named People magazine's "Sexiest Man Alive".
His films include Clueless (1995), Halloween: The Curse of Michael Myers (1995), Romeo + Juliet (1996), Wet Hot American Summer (2001), Anchorman: The Legend of Ron Burgundy (2004), [[The 40-Year-Old Virgin]] (2005), Knocked Up (2007), I Love You, Man (2009), This Is 40 (2012), and Anchorman 2: The Legend Continues (2013). Notably, he has played the superhero [[Scott Lang]] / [[Ant-Man]] in the [[Marvel Cinematic Universe]] (MCU), beginning with [[ant-man (movie)|Ant-Man (2015)]] and most recently in [[Ant-Man and the Wasp: Quantumania]] (2023) and the Ghostbuster Gary Grooberson in Ghostbusters: Afterlife (2021) and Ghostbusters: Frozen Empire (2024).

title: ant-man_(movie)
body: 2015 film in the [[Marvel Cinematic Universe]] and [[Ant-Man]]'s debut into the live action films. It stars [[Paul Rudd]] as [[Scott Lang]] / Ant-Man. Later followed with a sequel, [[Ant-Man and the Wasp]].

title: the_lego_batman_movie
body: The Lego Batman Movie is a 2017 animated superhero comedy film, based on characters created by [[DC Comics]] and the Lego Batman toy line. It was directed by Chris McKay (in his feature directorial debut) from a screenplay that is based on a Seth Grahame-Smith story. The film is a collaboration between production houses from the United States, Australia, and Denmark, the first spin-off in [[The Lego Movie]] franchise and the second installment overall. The film features Will Arnett reprising his role as Batman from The Lego Movie alongside Zach Galifianakis, Michael Cera, Rosario Dawson, and Ralph Fiennes. The story follows Batman as he attempts to overcome his greatest fear while saving Gotham City from the Joker's latest scheme.

title: the_40-year-old_virgin
body: The 40-Year-Old Virgin is a 2005 American romantic comedy film directed by Judd Apatow (in his feature directorial debut), who produced the film with Clayton Townsend and Shauna Robertson. It features [[Steve Carell]] as the titular 40-year-old virgin Andy, an employee at an electronics store. [[Paul Rudd]], Romany Malco, and Seth Rogen play co-workers who resolve to help him lose his virginity, and Catherine Keener stars as Andy's love interest, Trish.

title: sausage_party
body: Sausage Party is a 2016 adult animated comedy film directed by Conrad Vernon and Greg Tiernan (in his feature length directorial debut), written by Kyle Hunter, Ariel Shaffir, Seth Rogen and Evan Goldberg, and based on a story by Rogen, Goldberg and Jonah Hill. The film stars the voices of Rogen, Kristen Wiig, Hill, Bill Hader, [[Michael Cera]], James Franco, Danny McBride, Craig Robinson, [[Paul Rudd]], Nick Kroll, David Krumholtz, Edward Norton, and [[Salma Hayek]]. A parody of Disney and Pixar films, the film follows an anthropomorphic sausage who lives in a supermarket and goes on a journey with his friends to escape their fate as groceries while also facing a malicious douche out f

title: tenjou_utena
body: A tomboyish, courageous and naïve character who lives to emulate the idealized prince figure from her childhood. She is forthright, honest, and friendly. Nearly all the girls in school idolize her. She both subverts and conforms to the stereotypes she embodies as a noble warrior and a naive magical girl in danger of becoming a damsel in distress. The series chronicles her journey to protect her friend [[Himemiya Anthy]] and become a truly noble Prince. Her Dueling Rose is white. Utena's Japanese voice actress is the late [[Kawakami Tomoko]], and similarly her English voice actress is the late [[Rachael Lillis]].

title: tracer_(overwatch)
body:
[i]"Cheers, love!  The cavalry's here!"[/i]

Real Name: Lena Oxton
Age: 26
Occupation: Adventurer
Country: England

An offense-class character in [[Overwatch]]. Lena Oxton (call sign: "Tracer") was handpicked to test the prototype of a teleporting fighter, the Slipstream. During its flight, the aircraft malfunctioned and disappeared. Lena was presumed dead. Months later she reappeared, but her molecules had desynchronized from the flow of time and she would disappear from the present on occasion. A scientist by the name of [[winston_(overwatch)|Winston]] developed a chronal accelerator for her to anchor herself to the present, and control her flow of time at will.

In "Reflections", Tracer was shown together with her [[yuri|girlfriend]] [[emily (overwatch)|Emily]].

VA: [[Cara Theobold]] (English), [[Katou Emiri|Emiri Katou]] (Japanese), Analiz Sanchez (Latin American Spanish), Ana de Castro (European Spanish), Dorothée Pousséo (French)

body: A [[Japan]]ese braised [[pork]] dish made by simmering thick cubes of pork belly in dashi, [[soy sauce]], mirin, [[sugar]], and [[sake]]. title: x-ray
body:
Seeing inside or through a normally opaque barrier, as if by x-ray vision. Examples: skin, bone, armor, metal containers, concrete walls...

Typically rendered as a partially transparent overlay, or a cut-out. The internal and external views should always be overlapping. Rule of thumb: It's [[x-ray]] if Superman could see it with x-ray vision.

Use [[x-ray film]] for the images taken with actual [[x-ray machine]]s (or any medical device that takes cross-section images).

h4. Disambiguation

* [[Wet]], sheer, or clear clothing only qualifies as [[see-through clothes]] because it has natural transparency.
* A cut-out internal view separated from the main image only qualifies as [[cross-section]] because it doesn't show the external barrier.
* [[Slime girl]] is a class by itself.

title: puss_in_boots:_the_last_wish
body:
Puss in Boots: The Last Wish is a 2022 American animated adventure comedy film produced by [[DreamWorks]]. The sequel to the spin-off film Puss in Boots (2011) and the sixth installment of the [[shrek (series)|Shrek film series]]. 

The story follows [[Puss in Boots (shrek)|]], who teams up with [[Kitty Softpaws]] and [[Perrito (puss in boots)|]] to find the Last Wish of the fallen Wishing Star to restore eight of his nine lives. They race against other fairy tale characters seeking the same treasure, while [[death (puss in boots)|a sinister wolf]] hunts Puss himself.
other_names: 長ぐつをはいたネコと9つの命
ながぐつをはいたネコと9つのいのち

title: ahegao
body:
Ahegao (アヘ顔, lit. "ahe face", where "ahe" is a sound effect for wild moaning) is a facial expression where the [[rolling eyes|eyes are rolled up]], the [[open mouth|mouth is open]], and the [[tongue out|tongue is sticking out]]. Frequently accompanied by [[blush|blushing]], [[drooling]], [[sweat|sweating]], raising the eyebrows, or a [[double V]] gesture.

This expression usually (but not always) indicates a state of exaggerated sexual pleasure. It can also indicate [[crazy|craziness]], [[drugged|drug influence]], or [[asphyxiation]].

Not to be confused with [[torogao]], which is an expression that usually indicates a state of trance-like pleasure. Ahegao is a more wild expression.

title: laffey_ii_(azur_lane)
body:
[[Azur Lane]]'s personification of the [i]Allen M. Sumner[/i]-class USS [i]Laffey[/i] (DD-724). 
Character design by [[Kaede (Yumesaki Kaede)|]], voiced by [[Naganawa Maria]]. 

She is not to be confused with her predecessor [[Laffey (Azur Lane)|]] (DD-459). She has the same body and memories as [[Laffey (Azur Lane)|]], but different equipment and abilities.

She is [[petite]], with [[long hair|long]] [[white hair]] in [[twintails]] and [[small breasts]]. Her new outfit consists of a [[criss-cross halter]] [[short dress|short]] [[white dress]] worn [[off shoulder]], new [[fake animal ears|false]] [[rabbit ears]], [[blue ribbon]]s, and [[white thighhighs]] with [[legwear garter]]s. Her new [[rigging]] is distinctly futuristic in nature, sporting her historical 12.7 cm twin gun mounts and [[holographic monitor]]s plus two [[drone]]s. 

Originally revealed in the trailer for the [i]Parallel Superimposition[/i] event in 2022, she was made playable from December 21, 2023 in the [i]Light-Chasing Sea of Stars[/i] event.

title: victorious
body:
Victorious is a teen musical sitcom created by Dan Schneider, which aired on [[Nickelodeon]] from 2010–13.

The star of the show is Tori Vega (Victoria Justice), who gets into Hollywood Arts (a school for the arts in Hollywood) after filling in for her less-talented sister Trina (Daniella Monet) during a big showcase. Backing her up throughout the experience is André Harris (Leon Thomas III), a musically gifted boy who almost immediately warms up to her. On the flip-side, there's Jade West (Elizabeth Gillies), a dark-natured girl acting as Tori's rival. Completing the cast are [[Cat Valentine|Caterina "Cat" Valentine]] ([[Ariana Grande]]), a hypersensitive girl on her own level of reality; Robbie Shapiro (Matt Bennett), an awkward and shy guy who is rarely seen without his puppet Rex Powers; and Beck Oliver (Avan Jogia), Jade's much more mellow significant other.

title: cat_valentine
body: Catarina "Cat" Valentine (portrayed by [[Ariana Grande]]) is a character from [[Victorious]]. She is fun, energetic, and at times oblivious.

Ren is the main protagonist/antagonist of the series. He first appeared in the pilot episode "Big House Blues". He is a friend of Stimpy

title: glutton
body: An excessively greedy eater, over-indulgent, and someone who consumes vast quantities of food. The character may be either thin or fat, the key is that they are are eating more than is considered usual or are obsessed with the consumption of food. This may be more obvious with fatter characters than thinner ones.

title: ludwig_von_koopa
body:
Ludwig von Koopa (also known as Kooky von Koopa) is the oldest [[Koopalings|Koopaling]] and was [[Bowser]]'s second-in-command until [[Bowser Jr.]] came along. He possesses a magnificent intelligence. He loves playing video games with his younger brothers, is somewhat arrogant, and is said to be the cruelest of all the Koopalings, but is still very much into culture; he likes listening to classical music and is a composer himself.

h4. Official Art
* !post #7952731

title: wendy_o._koopa
body:
Wendy O. Koopa (also known as Kootie Pie Koopa) is the only female of the [[Koopalings]], and was named after the late singer Wendy O. Williams. Wendy is, more or less, a spoiled brat with a quick temper, often going into a rage over little things. She is also fairly materialistic and greedy. Regardless of her femme traits as a female villain, she is stated to be a tomboy.

h4. Official Art
* !post #7938213

title: roy_koopa
body:
Roy Koopa (also known as Bully Koopa) is one of the larger [[Koopalings]]. From what has been revealed about Roy's personality, he is more brawn than brains, preferring brute force over thinking things through. Despite this gruff, tough-guy demeanor, Roy originally wore a pink shell, which may be a reference to the fact that some say pink is a manly color. He now wears a purple shell though. Roy also wears red sunglasses similar to his namesake, Roy Orbison.

h4. Official Art
* !post #7938215

title: larry_koopa
body:
Larry Koopa (also known as Cheatsy Koopa) is one of the [[Koopalings]]. He has no particular namesake, though in the past he was stated to have been named after U2 drummer Larry Mullen Jr.. Larry loves to play tennis and has blue hair like [[Ludwig Von Koopa]]. He originally had four visible fangs on the top corners of both sides of his mouth, however in New Super Mario Bros. Wii, he only has two.

h4. Official Art
* !post #7938214

title: lemmy_koopa
body: Lemmy Koopa (Hip Koopa in other media) is one of the youngest of the [[Koopalings]], and the smallest. Named after [[Lemmy Kilmister]], the frontman/bassist of the English rock/[[heavy metal]] band [[motorhead|Motörhead]], he is often associated with childish traits due to his stature and personality. He retains a childlike innocence about him. Because of his traits, Lemmy is exceedingly immature; he prefers clowning around rather than conquering. He is well recgonized for his multicolored mohawk, crossed eyes, and affinity for circus balls.
other_names: レミー(スーパーマリオ)

title: morton_koopa_jr.
body: Morton Koopa Jr. (also known as Big Mouth Koopa Jr.) is one of the [[Koopalings]], named after the late talk show host Morton Downey Jr. Although he is the largest of the siblings, Morton isn't as powerful as some of his other large brothers, like [[Ludwig Von Koopa]] or [[Roy Koopa]]. This may just be due to the fact that he is one of the younger Koopalings, and needs to grow some more. Morton and his brother, [[Larry Koopa]], have a star-shaped birthmark on their heads. He is also the only Koopaling to have a different skin tone rather than the yellow tone the others have.

title: iggy_koopa
body: Iggy Koopa (also known as Hop Koopa) is one of the [[Koopalings]], named after Iggy Pop. Iggy is depicted as a demented, mechanical genius. His two main outstanding physical characteristics are his green hair (originally pink, light blue, and yellow), his glasses, as well as his thinness among the Koopalings.
other_names: イギー(スーパーマリオ)

title: bakugou_mitsuki
body:
Character in [[Boku no Hero Academia]]. Mother of [[Bakugou Katsuki]] and wife to [[Bakugou Masaru]].

Her Quirk, [i]Glycerin[/i], allows her to secrete a smooth liquid from her skin. This would combine with Masaru's [i]Oxidizing Sweat[/i], which gives his sweat the same properties as nitric acid, into their son Katsuki's signature [i]Explosion[/i] Quirk. Furthermore, she has passed on her [[blonde hair]] and short fuse to her son, as Mitsuki is demonstrated to be similarly temperamental.

title: tennis
body:
A sport usually played between two players (singles) or between two teams of two players each (doubles). Each player uses a racket that is strung to strike a hollow rubber ball covered with felt over a net into his opponent's court. The object of the game is to play the ball in such a way that the opponent is not able to play a good return. Tennis is an Olympic sport and is played at all levels of society at all ages. The sport can be played by anyone who can hold a racket, including people in wheelchairs.

The player gets 15 points each time his opponent either misses the ball, strikes the ball to the outside of the court or the net, or fails to serve the ball twice. The player can only get a maximum of 40 points. Upon winning a break point, the player wins the game and this continues after the player wins 6 games or 2 more games than his opponent, thus winning the set.

If the game system is best of 3, the player must win 2 sets to win the match. If it is best of 5, he must win 3 sets to do exactly the same.

title: asakura_toru
body:
One of the idols available in the [[Idolmaster Shiny Colors]]. She is a member of the unit [[noctchill_(idolmaster)|]]. She is the leader of the unit.

She has [[short hair|short]] [[purple hair|purple]] and [[blue hair|blue]] [[gradient hair]] with an [[ahoge]], [[blue eyes]], [[earrings]] and [[ear piercing]]s, and [[blue nails|blue]] [[nail polish]]. Her [[school uniform]] consists of a [[white shirt|white]] [[dress shirt]] (often with a [[pen]] in her [[breast pocket]]), a [[grey skirt|grey]], [[plaid skirt|plaid]] [[pleated skirt]], [[black socks]] and a [[blue cardigan]] [[cardigan around waist|around her waist]].
